alert.note: Alert for Heard; Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 3:13PM EDT until June 30 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Meriwether County in west central Georgia... Southern Heard County in west central Georgia... Troup County in west central Georgia... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 313 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Glenn to Hillcrest to Hogansville, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Hogansville, Corinth, Mountville, Cannonville, Louise, Odessadale, State Line Park, Abbottsford, Stovall, Piedmont Heights, Harrisonville, Hillcrest, Big Springs, Wares Crossroads, Paran, Glenn, Smiths Crossroad, Long Cane and Waresville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
